Source.Name: pngcrush
Source.Summary: Tool for optimizing the compression of PNG files.
Source.Description: pngcrush is a free and open source command-line utility for optimizing PNG image files. It reduces the size of the file losslessly – that is, the resulting "crushed" image will have the same quality as the source image.

Package.Name: pngcrush
Package.Summary: Tool for optimizing the compression of PNG files.
Package.Description: pngcrush is a free and open source command-line utility for optimizing PNG image files. It reduces the size of the file losslessly – that is, the resulting "crushed" image will have the same quality as the source image.
